reporter_caption.center: GEORGE v. CITY OF HORNELLSVILLE, 19 App. Div. 627 (1897)

caption.center: Frank George v. City of Hornellsville et al.; William Howell and Another
v. City of Hornellsville et al.; James Fahy v. City of Hornellsville et

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, Fourth Department.

opinion.opinion_text: Motion to dismiss appeals denied, and the defendants, The Bank of Hornellsville and others, allowed forty additional days "to make and serve amendments to the proposed case of the plaintiff, James Fahy." No costs are allowed to any of the parties. Follett, J., not sitting.
